file.name: circular-references-instantiation.yaml
file.content:
meta:
  title: "circular references - client instance instantiation"
cases:
- name: cross-document circular reference
  remoteDocuments:
    a.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          MessageWidgetData:
            $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Action"
  action:
    type: instantiateResolve
    config:
      url: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties:
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
- name: cross-document circular reference with `useCircularStructures` set
  remoteDocuments:
    a.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          MessageWidgetData:
            $ref: "./b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
    b.yaml:
      openapi: 3.0.2
      components:
        schemas:
          Action:
            properties:
              confirmation:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation'
          ActionConfirmation:
            properties:
              dismiss_action:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Action"
  action:
    type: instantiateResolve
    config:
      url: "http://mock.swagger.test/a.yaml"
      useCircularStructures: true
  assertions:
  - equal:
      errors: []
      spec:
        openapi: 3.0.2
        components:
          schemas:
            MessageWidgetData:
              $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
              properties: &circularRefAnchor
                confirmation:
                  $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/ActionConfirmation"
                  properties:
                    dismiss_action:
                      $$ref: "http://mock.swagger.test/b.yaml#/components/schemas/Action"
                      properties: *circularRefAnchor

Error: invalidYAML: yaml: anchor 'circularRefAnchor' value contains itself
